attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To secure long term funding for this much needed group in Hornchurch that helps so many children with adhd and helps their parents to better understand how to help their children.Every year they struggle to get funds and it would be tragic to loose them after all the good work they have done.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
